title: Charge arrangement of given electric field graph

content.question: The graph above shows the electric field E as a function of x, where x is the distance from a given charge arrangement in an xyz-coordinate system. Which of the following could be the arrangement?

choices.label: A positive point charge at x = 0
Positive charges uniformly distributed inside a sphere with x = 0 on the sphere’s surface
Positive charges uniformly distributed on the surface of a sphere with x = 0 on the sphere’s surface
Positive charges uniformly distributed along the y-axis
Positive charges uniformly distributed over the yz-plane

content.answer: Positive charges uniformly distributed over the yz-plane

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
